name: Kagutsuchi
description: Kagutsuchi is an adult god that appears to be in his early twenties. He has short wavy black hair often resembling flame-like shapes, and in Chapter 96 his hair is shown to turn into flames when using his fire abilities. His battle garb consists of a smoke wisp-patternedkariginuworn half-off over a chest-plate with similar smoke patterns, hakama and boots, as well as rings on each finger with an engraved design. He is normally seen with the corners of his eyes painted.

name: Suzuha
description: Suzuha was a young-looking Shinki who looked around Yukine's age. He had short messy dark brown hair and vibrant green eyes. He was often shown with a smile on his face. He wore a black jacket over a gray sweater hoodie and a black shirt underneath. He also wore brown jeans and red sneakers. During the summers he spent withTomoko, he was often seen wearing a white shirt (or sometimes blue or purple shirt), a white and blue baseball cap or a straw hat, brown jeans or brown shorts, and sandals....

name: Satō
description: Satou is a man of advanced age, with bushy eyebrows, a bald head, a beard, and several moles on his face. He is seen wearing a kimono and ahaori(羽織) coat with a black collar.

attributes.Alt. Name: 73代目墓守 Nanajyuusan-daime hakamori , 73rd Grave-keeper (by himself

name: Kazuma
description: Physically, Kazuma appears no older than 19 years old.He has short cut brown hair and green eyes, and is 174 cm tall.[citation needed]He wears a pair of thick-rimmed glasses and is normally seen dressed in the common uniform forBishamonten's battle shinki. This consists of a black suit with red detailing and a purple tie. Prior to theMa-clan's extinction, he wears a green kimono with his hair tied back into a low bun.

name: Izanami
description: Izanami's true form is a body in a state of very severe decomposition, so much that she is practically a living skeleton. It is unclear whether the long, dark hair is truly a part of her body that hasn't decomposed as badly or rather just a remnant of her fake illusion under which she had appeared to Yato. In all of her forms, Izanami is seen wearing a long dyed kimono with flower motifs over a plain white kimono.

description: Momo is a young man who appears to be in his late teens or early twenties. He has brown hair in the shape of a bowl cut, as well as large, round glasses. He also wears a suit and tie. While being dismissed byYato, he is seen wearing a down jacket over the suit and carrying a black shoulder bag.

attributes.Alt. Name: Ami-chan (by Hiyori

name: Stationmaster Tama
description: In real life, Tama is a stray cat who was adopted and hired as the stationmaster and operating officer of Kishi Station on the Kishigawa Line in Wakayama prefecture, Japan. She became well-adored by the station's customers and gained fame in Japanese media and pop culture. After her death in June 2015 (five months prior to her appearance in the manga), she was enshrined and deified.
role: Goddess of Fortune Stationmaster Operating officer

attributes.Occupation: Goddess of Fortune Stationmaster Operating officer

name: Kaya
description: Kaya was a young-looking woman described as having pockmarks on her face.She had bangs that reached to her eyes, side bangs that cropped around her chin, and a long ponytail tied at the base of her skull. She wore a tatteredkosode小袖and ashibiradatsumono褶だつもの wrapping skirt, typical attire of commoner women at the time.

name: Ōkuninushi
description: Ōkuninushi has the appearance of a middle-aged man with white hair and a tan complexion. He has short, spiky blonde hair and a goatee, as well as a distinct tuft of chest hair that is usually visible through his clothing. Since he is always wearing a pair of aviator sunglasses, his eyes are completely obscured, though they have been shown once and appear very sharp.

attributes.Alt. Name: 大黒天 Daikokuten 土蜘蛛オオナムチ Tsuchigumo Ōnamuchi イズモ Izumo ヤクモ Yakumo

name: Akiha
description: He is a strong but shy man. He stands strong with his ideas but can easily fall under pressure. In OVA 2 he tries not to drink at the picnic, but soon later he becomes drunk. DespiteYatoandYukinebeing enemies, he showed reverence at Yukine's ability to turn into a blessed regalia. He says that they were impressive, indicating he gives credit where it is due. He also seems to be a good leader since he tried to help lead the other shinki to safety when ayakashi were attacking them, showing conc...

attributes.Alt. Name: 秋器 Shūki (by Bishamonten

name: Sakuya-bime
description: Sakuya-bime is loyal toHeaven. She is caring for others, but reluctant to carry out responsibilities she may view was strenuous or unfavorable, such as talking downTakemikazuchiduring a battle. (She is also somewhat frivolous as she suggested playing rock-paper-scissors to decide who goes.) She does not show nervousness or discomfort on the battlefield herself, and thus may be decently accustomed to combat.

name: Benzaiten
description: Benzaiten is a woman who seems to be in her early twenties. She has yellow-brown eyes and maroon-colored hair, which is worn in a high bun with a black, flower-shaped cloth holding it in place. She is also seen wearing ball-shaped earrings and two pieces of jewelry in her hair, and has a tattoo of a music note underneath her left collarbone. In the anime, she is seen wearing a low-cut, floor-length black dress. (In the manga, the skirt of the dress is white instead of black.) Over this, she w...
role: Goddess of Fortune Goddess of knowledge, art, beauty

attributes.Occupation: Goddess of Fortune Goddess of knowledge, art, beauty

name: Mutsumi
description: In the anime, Mutsumi is said to often skip classes due to sickness, disregards the proper uniform rule, and for some reason the teachers always forgive her. This causes her classmates to hate and bully her; saying that she is acting like she’s special when she's not, that she's annoying, and that she should just kill herself. In the manga, aside from the aforementioned personality she is also somehow childish, refers to herself as a third person, and doesn't get why people around her dislike...

name: Yatagarasu
description: Yatagarasu(ヤタガラス,Yatagarasu?)is the three-legged crow god. He is one of the gods summoned byHeavento subjugateBishamonandthe Crafter.

name: Ōshi
description: She is an arrogant shinki willing to do whatever it takes to follow heaven's orders. Despite calling the Gods Lord (-sama in Japanese). She called Ebisu stupid for attempting to control the ayakashi along with containing the Seven Gods claiming to protect their innocence. In reality, she didn't want them to interfere and help Ebisu, showing she may secretly look down on the Gods. This is made much more apparent when Okuninushi challenges her and she says a God without a shinki is useless. Kaz...

name: Mikagami
description: Mikagami is a woman of average height. She has long, dark hair with straight-cut bangs. She has one dark and one pale eye, like the two other Treasures. Mikagami appears to wear achihaya(襅) - an overcoat worn by shrine maidens during ceremonies - and amaetenkan(前天冠) headdress.

name: Tatsumi
description: TatsumiNameKanji截弥RomajiTatsumiProfileRaceShinkiGenderMaleEye ColorBlackHair ColorBlackStatusStatusDeceasedOccupationEbisu's shinkiDebutMangaChapter 30AnimeAragoto Episode 7PortrayalJapanese VoiceYoshitaka YamayaEnglish VoiceAaron DismukeTatsumi(截弥,Tatsumi?)is one ofEbisu's shinki who he brings intoYomi.

"woman from the western food restaurant")is a server at theOlive House, a restaurant that the previousEbisufrequented.

name: Saiun
description: Saiun is a young man appearing to be in his mid to late twenties. Like all of Takemikazuchi's shinki, he wears Shinto priest robes, and his hair is mostly loose with some locks pulled back into a ponytail at the back of his head. His official coloring as a human is unrevealed, but based on shading his hair appears to be brunette or black.

attributes.Alt. Name: 犀器 Saiki (vessel name by Takemikazuchi
attributes.Manga Debut: Chapter 35 (as a vessel) Chapter 61 (as a human

name: Sakura
description: Sakura was a young woman with dark brown hair tied into a ponytail on the top of her head, with a bead-adorned strand on the left side of her face. She appeared to be wearing a noblewoman's undergarments, consisting of a whitekosode小袖and a redkiribakama切袴.

attributes.Alt. Name: 珠音 Tamanone (human name

name: Kiyoko Onodera
description: Kiyoko is a short, elderly woman. She has presumably gray hair cut into a short bob. She is often depicted with her eyes closed, but her eyes are darkly colored and she uses dark, thick rimmed reading glasses. She is seen wearing slippers, a flower-patterned dress, and a dark-colored cap. She also wears the metal chain from her father's pocket watch as a bracelet. On the same arm, she has a burn scar imprinted by the chain, running from her palm to the back of her wrist.

name: Kinuha
description: While not much is known of her personality, she seems to be a calm, mature person. Shown whenKugahatook his clothes off to show he had no blight, all the other girls screamed and averted their eyes, but Kinuha looked calm and just kept staring. Like the rest of Bishamonten's shinki, she is loyal to her master. She can be somewhat curt as shown when her master and fellow shinki went toKofukuto see where vents would open, Kinuha mentioned how it was most likely that Kofuku's bad luck caused the...

name: Shiiho
description: Shiiho has the appearance of a preteen boy. He has black hair and dark eyes. He wears a white kimono top with black stripes on the sleeves over a blackgakuran. He also wears a pair of boots that reach his lower shins.
